alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 9:52AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, Evangeline, southwestern Avoyelles, north central St. Landry and northeastern Allen Parishes through 1015 AM CDT... At 952 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Turkey Creek, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Ville Platte, Bunkie, Turkey Creek, Morrow, Pine Prairie, Evergreen, Bayou Chicot, Goudeau, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Whiteville, Big Cane, Dupont, Beaver, Grand Prairie and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 34 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry
